author: doll
msg: Transformed the AbstractGadgetData class into a utility class than can transform any java object into json. This is needed for the restful apis.
I will replace all of the current instances of AbstractGadgetData in another patch.

author: elemings
msg: Added collate class template specialization for UDC type (just
prior to CollateDerived class template) to define protected
virtual functions expected by test cases.

author: adrianc
msg: Fixed a bug in the Form Widget where alt-target elements in extended forms were being added to the parent form's alt-targets. Also overriding an alt-target in an extended form works now.
